root.name: Armada 2526
root.description: Armada 2526 is the sequel to the DOS game Armada 2525. The game comes from designer R. T. Smith, who designed Armada 2525 and worked as a designer on many of the Total War games.Similar to the Total War series, this game features a strategic turn-based map and 3D real-time battles.PC System RequirementsMinimumOS: XP, Vista, 7CPU: Intel 1 GhzRAM: 1 GBHDD: 2 GB free disk spaceGraphics: 128 MB Graphics MemorySound Card: DirectX 9 CompatibleDirectX: Version 9.0c
